description: A first person perspective adventure game in which the player takes the role of a detective that has to investigate a murder in an actress school.

name: Lunar Wing: Toki wo Koeta Seisen
description: Lunar Wing - Toki wo Koeta Seisen is a love-themed strategy RPG in which players take part in battles using the game's active time simulation battle system while attempting to earn the affection of bishojo ( used to refer to young and pretty girls, usually below university age) characters.

name: Oasis Road
description: Oasis Road is a game in which the player controls a group of kids that lives in a future world that is all in the desert, They will have to explore the world (specially the ancient ruins of old cities) in search of rare items and make new travel routes. The game could be different depending of the...

name: Twins Story: Kimi ni Tsutaetakute...
description: A visual novel developped by Fujitsu.

name: Shirahana no Ori - Hiiro no Kakera 4
description: A visual novel developped by Otomate and the prequel of the first Hiiro no Kakera.

name: Kaze no Oka Kouen nite
description:
Kaze no Oka Kouen Nite is a first person adventure game in which the player takes the role of a young student that arrives at a town and begins the class in fall in a new high school when he will find 4 girls, that one of them can be the love of his live.

The gameplay is about choosing at some...

name: My Garden
description: My Garden is a game similar game to Harvest Moon series, but instead or having a farm, the player controls a young girl taking care of a garden. She will have to plant different kind of seeds and different kind of plants and trees. The player can sell the plants to gain money to buy new seeds and...

name: Racing
description: Racing as the title suggests is a simple racing game. It features both a short and a long distance race course, a mirrored version of the long course, plus different skill levels. Before a race begins, players select a car (out of 6 total), and then set whether they want automatic or manual...

name: L@ve Once
description: L@ve Once (read as "love at once") is a romance visual novel that tells the story of a boy called Shouji Takanashi (高梨 翔司) whose mother is a mermaid. He met mermaids as a small child but forgot about them. One day, his father passes away and not long after, two sisters, who happen to be mermaids as...

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Kurt Irving's First Mission
description: Kurt Irving's First Mission is a pre-order bonus content of Valkyria Chronicles 3. It is also included in the Valkyria Chronicles 3 Extra Edition

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: The Secret of Her Powers
description:
The Secret of Her Powers is a downloadable content for Valkyria Chronicles 3. The DLC contains a mission called Power to Protect and can be purchased for 600Yen from PlayStation Store. In the Valkyria Chronicles 3 Extra Edition, it is among the several DLCs already included with the game.

Unlocked...

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: No.1 is Restless
description: No.1 is Restless is a downloadable content of Valkyria Chronicles 3. The DLC contains a mission called Cold War. It was released on February 24, 2011 and can be purchased for 600Yen from the Playstation Store. In the Valkyria Chronicles 3 Extra Edition, it is among the several downloadable contents...

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - The Barricaded Harbour
description: A Disciplinary Mission addon for the original release of Valkyria Chronicles 3, and later bundled into Valkyria Chronicles 3 E2: EXTRA MISSIONS.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - A Clash Battle! Welkin vs. Dahau
description: Welkin Gunter, the hero of the Gaul rescue, Dahow, the man who knows the battlefield. They clashed and fight in one phase of the Gaul front. An episode depicting the battle between heroes and masters from the perspective of the 7th platoon of the volunteer army such as Welkin.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - The War Ends and His Journey Begins
description: Empire General Radi Jaeger disappeared with the end of the Gaul front. Another episode of the end of the war, where Jaeger's own perspective tells what he thought and where he disappeared.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - Behind the Scenes of Cardinal Borgia Escort
description: This episode depicts Cardinal Borgia escort operation, which failed. However, the Dahau who attacked the nameless had another intentions in mind. This episode features Calamity Raven, who depicts the enemy side of Chapter 4.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - The Treacherous Valkyria
description: This battle that takes place against all Valkyria in the alternate timeline, which is not to be considered canon. Can you win against Selvaria, Alicia, Alias, and another new Valkyria?

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - Selvaria at Naggiar
description: Selvaria uses the power of Valkyria in the "Naggiar Battle" on the Gaul front. Audrey Tautou's Gaul troops witness the power of myth. An episode from an imperial perspective with Selvaria as the main character.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Episode - A Clash Battle? Edy vs. Dahau
description: This episode takes place during "Clash! Welkin vs Dahau" DLC. Edy and her self-proclaimed "Edy Squad", who were separated from the 7th Platoon, encounter Lydia and Jig's separate team of Calamity Raven.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex The Targeted Stockpile Goods
description: Black crows flock to the abandoned stockpile. Protect your stockpile from cunning mass attacks!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex Liberate the Aqueduct
description: Bombing sounds echo in the late of night! Destroy enemy command tanks in the bombardment!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex What Lurks in the Desert
description: Bombardment from the sky and hunters on the ground in the dark of night in this difficult vehicle escort mission!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex Steel Trap
description: Heavy-duty unit led by a dark villain suddenly appears in the desert. Break through a steel siege and destroy enemy command tanks!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex The Looming Nightmare
description: The shadow of a giant tank towers over the wilderness... Only two heroines lead a fierce defense battle that is about to begin!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Extra Mission - Hard-Ex The Uninvited Crows
description: Break through the defense of the Calamity Unit, led by the young, brave commander who was waiting in the mountain fortress and conquer the enemy's main base!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - Things That Stand in the Way
description: Collect all the recovered supplies through a bombardment, a turbulent interception, and brilliant anti-tank sniper's eyes!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - Fangs of the Viper
description: A vicious hitman lurks in a floating city... Activate the giant drawbridge before you get poisoned!

name: Valkyria Chronicles 3: Penalty Mission - Things to Shoot Through
description: Escort an armored car safely from the armed supply base before being targeted by a powerful sniper who also penetrates steel!

name: Sakura-sou no Pet na Kanojo
description: Sakura-sou no Pet na Kanojo is a visual novel based on a light novel of the same name, developed by Netchubiyori and published by ASCII Media Works.

name: Noise City Osaka
description:
Sougaku Toshi Osaka is a simulation game that takes place in the future in which the player can choose a party of 3 member from 6 different characters.

In the game the characters can improve their stats doing different jobs and activities each week meanwhille they go to different places of Osaka...

name: Velldeselba Senki: Tsubasa no Kunshou
description: A flight simulation shooting game set in the fictional planet Verdecelba. The main character Misaki who crashes on Verdeselba and survives the war while engaging with various people and the military. Unlike the Ace Combat series, this game emphasizes the appeal of flying slowly in the sky. You...

name: Earthworm Jim PSP
description:
Earthworm Jim PSP was first announced at E3 2006 by Atari, which had obtained the rights to produce an Earthworm Jim game for a handheld console, and a deal with Sony had been made.

Atari announced that Earthworm Jim PSP would be a 2D sidescrolling platformer with elements of a run and gun,...

name: Sakaagari Hurricane Portable
description: Takumi transfers to a new high school where Yukari, his old friend, goes. He visits the school for a preview and meets a girl there. On the next day, when he goes to school, there is that girl in his class. He is appointed class president and ordered to take care of an opinion box. One day, a piece...

name: Daisenryaku Daitoua Kouboushi: Tora Tora Tora Ware Kishuu ni Seikou Seri
Lair Land Story
description: This raising simulation follows Xero, a great hero of Lairland, and the mysterious holy woman Chilia. Over four in-game years together, Xero helps Chilia to blossom into her own person while also recovering her lost memories. Like in Princess Maker, the player's job is to set out her schedule with...

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Battle at Roendahl EX
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description: The main Class G group must open the flood gate using the switch in area 4, then Avan must move to the target point in area 3 by passing through the flood gate.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Battle at Doeffein EX
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Avan will carry out this mission alone.

Use the trolley cars effectively and capture the enemy base camp in Area 4.

The mission will fail if Avan falls in battle.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Battle at Mellvere EX
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
This operation will be carried out in Mellvere by Avan, Zeri and Cosette.

Capture the enemy base camp in Area 1. The mission will fail if all 3 members fall in battle.

Cannon towers have been sighted in the combat zone, so be prepared for a rough fight, and advance with caution.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Battle at Lanseal EX
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Avan, Zeri and Cosette must move with the escort APC to the target point in Area 1.

The main Class G force and Avan, Zeri and Cosette will operate separately for this mission.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Seven Secrets
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Class G has been assigned a top-secret mission by the Gallian Army.

Army forces transporting secret documents were attacked at the Anthold Aqueduct, and the documents cannot be allowed to fall into the wrong hands.

Retrieve 7 crates scattered across the areas.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Warship Showdown
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A large rebel warship carrying V2 forces is preparing to sail north.

Class G must defeat all enemy units in each area within 8 turns.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Ultimate Challenge
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Defend the allied base camps in Areas 1, 2 and 3 aboard the large rebel warship for 20 turns.

Enemy forces include large numbers of V2s, so your abilities will be tested to the limit.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Race Against Time
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Rebel special ops are experimenting with a new communications device in the Roendahl Canyon.

Capture the enemy base camp in Area 3 within 5 turns to stop them before the experiments are completed.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Two-Pronged Assault
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Rebel forces, including V2s, are battling the Gallian Army at Anthold Harbor.

Defend the allied base camps in areas 3 and 5 for 8 turns until the arrival of reinforcements to replenish the heavy casualties the army has taken.

It also appears the enemy has deployed howitzers in the vicinity. Be...

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Banquet of Ghosts
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A large number of ghost tanks have appeared at Anthold Harbor.

Defeat all enemy units in each area

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Cerculean Catastrophe
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Hold the defensive line in Area 4 aboard the large rebel warship for 8 turns.

Enemy forces include large number of V2s and ghost tanks, so be ready for a tough fight.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Mellvere Crisis
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Rebel forces have attacked while Avan is visiting Mellvere.

Avan must capture the enemy base camp alone, as the rebels used a diversion to draw the town watch away.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Mine Offensive
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
Rebel forces are attempting to steal ragnite from the Doerfein Mines.

Capture the enemy camps marked in areas 1, 2 and 3 to drive them back.

We have heard that the enemy is equipped with heavy weapons, so be on your toes.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Final Scout Exam
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A final exam to test Scout class abilities will be held.

Retrieve 8 crates scattered across the areas.

The exam will take place under actual combat conditions, so stay focused on your objective.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Final Lancer Exam
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A final exam to test Lancer class abilities will be held.

Capture the enemy camp in Area 1 within 5 turns.

The exam will take place under actual combat conditions, so stay focused on your objective.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Final Tech Exam
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description: A final examination of Armored Technicians will be held at the Anthold Aqueduct! Destroy all enemies with the skill armor and sword armor! This is a one-player mission.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Final Engineer Exam
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A final exam to test Engineer class abilities will be held.

Move the escort APC to the target point in Area 5.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Final Trooper Exam
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A final exam to test Shocktrooper class abilities will be held.

Capture the enemy camps in Areas 1 and 4 within 5 turns.

The exam will take place under actual combat conditions, so stay focused on your objective.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Exercise vs. Class C
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A goods retrieval exercise will be carried out versus Class C.

Retrieve 5 crates scattered across the areas.

In order to replicate an actual battle as closely as possible, Class C has been granted the use of multiple tanks.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Exercise vs. Class D
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A defense exercise will be carried out versus Class D.

Defend the allied base camps in Areas 1, 4 and 5 for 8 turns.

Be aware that poor weather is expected.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Exercise vs. Class E
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
A clean-up exercise versus a rival class. It takes place in the vast Leanbluff forest. Defeat all enemy units in the area. In order to replicate real battle as closely as possible, Class E has been granted to deploy multiple tanks.

Go through intensive training alongwith fellow cadets from Class G...

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Exercise vs. Class F
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description:
An assault exercise versus a rival class. Run through stonewalling defence and take over the camp! In order to replicate a real battle as closely as possible, Class F has been granted to deploy multiple tanks.

Go through intensive training along with fellow cadets from Class G to defeat the Rebel...

name: Valkyria Chronicles 2: Additional Stickers DLC
genre: Real Time Strategy (RTS), Role-playing (RPG), Strategy, Turn-based strategy (TBS), Tactical
description: Character Popularity Contest Commemorative stickers. Illustrations of Magari of the the women's category, and Alexis of the men's category.

name: Love, Election & Chocolate Portable
description: Love, Election & Chocolate Portable is a PlayStation Portable port of the romance visual novel that puts the player in the shoes of a male student named Yuuki Oojima. The game is mostly driven by dialogue, with a limited amount of illustrations to accompany the story narrative.

name: Phase Shift: Threats Beyond the Network
description: Phase Shift follows the story of Xargis, a genius programmer fighting against cyber terrorism in the future. Defeat your enemies and protect The Network!

name: Shirahana no Ori: Hiiro no Kakera 4 - Shiki no Uta
description: A sequel to Shirahana no Ori - Hiiro no Kakera 4 with four seasonal stories: Song of Spring, Summer Festival, Autumn Harvest and Winter Snowflakes.

name: Hanaoni: Koi Someru Toki Towa no Shirushi
description: A visual novel developped by Otomate.

name: Sound of the Sky: Maiden Quintet
description: An adventure game based on the TV anime "Sound of the Sky". Members of the 1121st Platoon, a defense unit composed entirely of girls, are depicted struggling to perform at a music festival. Original characters that are not in the original also appear, and the story progresses with a little fan...

name: Akiba's Trip Plus
description: Akiba's Trip (アキバズトリップ Akibazutorippu, AKIBA'S TRIP) is a 2011 game for the PlayStation Portable (PSP) platform. It is the first game in the Akiba's series. The game was exclusively released in Japan. It is the first game in the Akiba's series. It was initially scheduled to be released on April 14,...

name: Crisis Core: Final Fantasy VII - Collector's Edition
description: This collector’s edition includes the complete PSP game (UMD, manual and box), the art book and a hard box to slide everything in.

name: Valhalla Knights 2: Battle Stance
description:
Valhalla Knights 2: Battle Stance is a Role-Playing game, developed by K2 and published by Marvelous Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 2009.

Battle Stance is an expanded version of Valhalla Knights 2 featuring all new changes.

name: Don 2: The Game
description: Don 2: The Game is a third-person action tie-in game for the 2011 film "Don 2: The King Is Back" developed by Gameshastra and published by Sony Computer Entertainment. The game loosely follows the plot of the film, with Don fighting back against his back-stabbing henchmen, European cartel bosses,...

name: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands
description: Prince of Persia: The Forgotten Sands for the PSP is a side-scrolling 2.5D platformer. It has a different storyline involving freeing the Sisters of Time, a different setting and antagonist. It was developed by the same team that developed the Wii Version and hence has the same artstyle.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva - Miku Uta, Okawari
description: The first Hatsune Miku: Project Diva DLC was released by SEGA on the PSN Store on 25 March 2010. It featured 9 songs sung by Hatsune Miku, high-quality polygon PVs of all the songs, "*Hello, Planet" 8-bit minigame (featuring 4 levels), and a special Miku theme for PSP XrossMediaBar (XMB) menu.

name: Hatsune Miku: Project Diva - Motto Okawari, Rin, Len, Luka
description: The second Hatsune Miku: Project Diva DLC was released by SEGA on the PSN Store on 1 July 2010. It featured 18 songs sung by Kagamine Len/Rin and Megurine Luka (2 songs by Len, 7 songs by Rin, and 9 songs by Luka), high-quality polygon PVs of all the songs, 'Toeto' Luka minigame, and special...

name: *Hello, Planet.
description: A 2D platformer minigame included with the first DLC for Hatsune Miku: Project DIVA (Miku Uta, Okawari).

name: Tomb Raider: 10th Anniversary Edition
description:
Tomb Raider: 10th Anniversary Edition (TRAE) was the last Tomb Raider game developed by Core Design, the original developers of Tomb Raider. It was a remake of the original 1996 game meant to be released for the series 10th anniversary in 2006.

In 2003, following the poor sales of Tomb Raider: The...

name: The History Channel: Great Battles of Rome
Hamster Club-i
description: Based on the Hamster Club manga, this virtual pet game has players raising dwarf hamsters. In the main raising mode, players take care of their pets and manage their stats. Actually growing their pets, though, requires taking part in the different minigame competitions. These action games, in...

name: Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side Premium 3rd Story
description:
Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side Premium 3rd Story is an enhanced port of Tokimeki Memorial Girl's Side: 3rd Story on the Nintendo DS.

New features:
• New character Tatsuya
• Renewed graphics with a 2D animation system
• "Boys' Life" mode, where the player can watch super-deformed versions of the...

name: Resident Evil: Director's Cut Dual Shock Ver.
description:
This game is a special re-release of Resident Evil: Director's Cut with added Dual Shock analog stick support. It also includes work in progress videos of the sequel Resident Evil 2 (also known as Resident Evil 1.5), which shows a very different version of the game than was actually released.

In...

name: Togainu no Chi True Blood
description:
Togainu no Chi True Blood is a Japanese BL visual novel. Can you help Akira, numb from a lifetime of violence and isolation, forge the bonds he needs to survive a ruined Tokyo's deadly underworld? '
True Blood is a re-released version of Togainu no Chi, featuring new CGs, characters, and scenes.

name: Abyss of the Sacrifice
description:
Set after the demise of a city deep underground, Misshitsu no Sacrifice tells the story of five young girls to attempt to escape and the friendships, enmity, and horror they experience along the way.

Players must solve a variety of puzzles to find out what the future holds for the young girls in...

name: Strike Witches: Hakugin no Tsubasa
description: Strike Witches: Hakugin no Tsubasa is a bullet hell shoot 'em up developed by Cyberfront and Gulty. The game is more specifically a horizontal scrolling twin-stick shooter with 3D models. The story mode is a fully voiced multi-ending scenario where the story changes greatly depending on the...

name: Tir-nan-óg: Yuukyuu no Jin
description: Tir-nan-og: Yuukyuu no Jin is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by SystemSoft, which was released in Japan in 2009.

name: Shall We Date?: Demons' Bond - The Path of Exile
description: Toki no Kizuna: Sekigahara Kitan is an otome game developed by Design Factory and Otomate. It was released on July 19, 2012 for Playstation Portable, and it is said to be the prequel of Hakuouki. Known as part of Shall we date ? games in English, and it is under the name Shall we date ?: Demons'...

name: Toki no Kizuna Hanayuitsuzuri
description: A fandisc for the original Toki no Kizuna, featuring original omake stories for all of the boys set after the end of the original game.

name: Final Fantasy II
description: The WonderSwan Color version of Final Fantasy II included completely redone graphics in the manner of the 16-bit generation Final Fantasy games and includes larger character sprites, remixed music by Tsuyoshi Sekito, and full graphical backgrounds in battle mode. It is from this base that the...

name: Densha de Go! Pocket: Chuuousen-hen
description: Densha de Go! Pocket: Chuuousen-hen (loosely translated to "Go by Train! Pocket: Chūō Line Edition") was released on January 19, 2006, including only the Chūō Main Line. It is a split port, based on the Chuuoo Line portions of Densha de GO! FINAL.

name: Densha de Go! Pocket: Osakakanjousen-hen
description:
Densha de Go! Pocket: Osakakanjousen-hen is a split port of the Densha de Go! Pocket line to the PlayStation Portable, all of which are based on parts of Desha de GO! FINAL:
- Densha de Go! Pocket: Osakakanjousen-hen (loosely translated to "Go by Train! Pocket: Osaka Loop Line Edition") was...

name: Densha de Go! Pocket: Toukaidousen-hen
description:
Densha de Go! Pocket: Toukaidousen-hen is a split port of the Densha de Go! Pocket line to the PlayStation Portable, all of which are based on parts of Desha de GO! FINAL:
- Densha de Go! Pocket: Toukaidousen-hen (loosely translated to "Go by Train! Pocket: Tōkaidō Line Edition") was released on...

name: Aoi Sora no Neosphere
description: A sequel of Tristia of the Deep-Blue Sea from Kogado Studio(Kumasan Team). Set in the Neosphere kingdom that fly in the air by ancient E technology. Neosphere kept going to ruin after world union war. And then, Nanoca was called to rebuild the kingdom.

name: Mobile Train Simulator + Densha de Go!: Tokyo Kyuukou-hen
description: Mobile Train Simulator + Densha de GO!: Tokyo Express Edition is a PlayStation Portable port of the 2003 PlayStation 2 game Train Simulator + Densha de GO!: Tokyo Express Edition. The game uses full-motion video from the train driver's perspective and features two gameplay modes, with the display,...

name: Final Fantasy VII International
description: Final Fantasy VII International is a direct port of the North American version, including all of its gameplay and storyline tweaks. It came with an extra fourth disc that includes bonus background information about the game itself.

name: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 5: Kazahanaki
description: The direct sequel to Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 5.

name: Danball Senki Boost
description: Danball Senki Boost is a PSP role-playing video game developed by Level-5. The game is a remake version of the original Danball Senki, with additional features and contents, plus a bonus teaser episode regarding the sequel.

name: MX vs. ATV: Untamed + Juiced 2 Double pack
Block Buster
description:
Block Buster (or Block Kuzushi or Simple 1500 Series vol.014 - The Block Kuzushi in Japan) is a good breakout game that can be played by 2 players in cooperative or VS mode.

The game offers some interesting special moves like the one in which you can hit the ball with effect pressing a buttom....

name: Baroque
description: Baroque is horror-themed action game with elements of survival gameplay. The whole game is set in the tower: you slowly work your way to the top, fighting demons as you progress. You have HP as well as stamina gauge. If your stamina is depleted, you walk slower and can't react well in a battle.

name: Tenchu Kurenai Portable
description: Tenchu Kurenai Portable is a PSP port of the PS2 title Tenchu: Fatal Shadows, exclusive to Japan.

name: Impossible Mission
description:
Re-imagining of the original 1980s classic
Choose from 3 characters
New tutorial mode
3 game modes
Full games haring on PSP

It's hard to believe that it was twenty-five years since the original release. Impossible Mission was the first game to use real synthesized speech, an incredible development...

name: Tantei Opera Milky Holmes 2
description: A sequel to Tantei Opera Milky Holmes.

name: Simple 1500 Series Vol. 101: The Sentou
description: In Simple 1500 series vol. 101 the Sentou the player takes the role of a young boy in charge of a bathhouse. Every week the player choose what duties will the boy do (cleaning the baths, rest, repair the ceiling, put more fire to the kettle, etc.) Depending on the jobs, the boy starts will increase...

name: Tales of Phantasia: Full Voice Edition
description: An enhanced remake of the original 1995 classic Tales of Phantasia, released exclusively for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Rebellions: Secret Game 2nd Stage
description:
Remake of Secret Game Code: Revise with 80% altered story.

14 people have been abducted and confined to small rural village . Each one has a metallic collar around their neck and a PDA representing a playing card from Ace to Joker with unique special function and clear condition, which they have...

name: Onigokko!
description:
- A relaxing high school rom-com visual novel with a mythological twist.
- Romance four descendants of ancient Japanese folk heroes.
- Track down a mysterious phantom thief masquerading as yourself, all the while learning about each girl.
- Enjoy a variety of references to stories of old.
- A...

name: Xump: The Final Run
description:
This version of Xump is an extended remake of the puzzle game Xump: The Final Run (which in turn is similar to the C64 game Sensitive) with improved graphics and new levels.

The goal is still the same: With your bot "Xump" you will have to remove all blue tiles on platforms somewhere in the sky by...

name: Action Pack I Prince of Persia: Revelations & Prince of Persia: Rival Swords
Frontier Gate Boost+
description: Frontier Gate Boost+ is a Role-Playing game, developed by Tri-Ace and published by Konami. While originally released in 2011, the game saw the released of an improved version known as Boost + in 2013.

name: Hakuoki Yuugiroku
description: Hakuouki Yuugiroku is the third installment in the Hakuouki series. This game takes a much more lighthearted approach as it mainly consists of three parts: the normal part, chibi characters part, and six mini-games.

name: XI Sai Jumbo
description:
XI JUMBO was released as a sequel to Devil Dice only released in Japan.

name: Neo Atlas
description: Neo ATLAS is a reimagining of Artdink's home computer Atlas series, with 32-bit era upgrades to graphics and gameplay. Neo ATLAS is a reimagining of Artdink's home computer Atlas series, with 32-bit era upgrades to graphics and gameplay.

It was released on PC and PlayStation 2 in 2004 followed by a port to PlayStation Portable in 2009. The first title of the...

name: Loonies 8192

This title was re-released on Xbox 360 in Namco Museum: Virtual Arcade. It was than re-released on the iPhone under the name Galaga Remix. It featured new bosses and...

description: A fandisc for the original MIYAKO game. Izumi holds a party for the shigoryou and shocks everyone by saying he’s disbanding their group. He also trusts Sangou with the mission of collecting magical shells to become a better shikigami.

Having lost her mother to disease, the young girl lives her days alone working for the head of the village. From a young age, she has the ability to see through lies, possessing what is called “Heaven’s...

Taishou Kitan was released in 2013.

New...

name: Sekai Saikyou Ginsei Igo 3
description: Sekai Saikyou Ginsei Igo 3 is a board game that offers authentic igo (weiqi) experience. Apart from matching with the computer, 2 player matching is also supported. Player can pick from three types of board: 9x9, 13x13 and 19x19, and set the game as even or with up to nine handicap stones. Jump...

name: Destinia
description: Destinia is an action/adventure RPG created by Aqua. It is the first in a long series of games, followed by Destinia Two, Destinia Three, and Destinia Strategy.

name: AI Mahjong Selection
description: High-resolution mode provides beautifully realistic titles. This mahjong game is authentic in that it transcends the unnatural strengths that other software has always depended on, such as simple memory, probability calculation, and calculation of variables. The development of new algorithms...

name: Zipangu Jima: Unmei ha Saikoro ga Kimeru!?
description: The main object of this history-based simulation board game is to control as many battle positions as possible. Procurement of all necessary resources is ultimately determined by a roll of the dice. Use the resources allotted to you to build roads and castles, or to strengthen your military....

name: AI Shogi Selection
description: Introducing the ideal shogi game--providing a combination of strength, aptitude, and speed so that you won't have to wait. The YSS7.0 engine by Hiroshi Yamashita, undefeated champion of the 7th World Computer Shogi Tournament, has been optimized for use on the PlayStation. There are 4 levels of...

name: Shinsou Kaiten!! Wan-wan Umi Monogatari: Sanyo Pachinko Paradise DX
description: Pachinko Paradise DX is the final PS1 release in Irem's long-running pachinko simulation series. It features reproductions of three pachinko machines made by Sanyo Bussan, all of which are returning from previous releases: CR Umi Monogatari 3R and CR Umi Monogatari 6 from Pachinko Paradise 2, and...

name: Tales of Phantasia: Cross Edition
description: A remake of Tales of Phantasia included within Tales of Phantasia: Narikiri Dungeon X. Includes various enhancements such a faster battle system more in-line with modern entries, revamped UI, a new character, and the full voice acting included in Full Voice Edition.

name: Hana to Ryuu
description: Hana to Ryuu is a yaoi manga series created by Kazuma Kodaka in 1993. Designed as a doujinshi, Hana to Ryu follows Ryuji Kazama, the son of a dead yakuza boss, as he struggles to maintain a peaceful existence while dealing with harmful forces all around him. Hana to Ryu takes place in the universe...

name: Gamocracy One: Legend of Robo7
description: A platformer that was developed in collaboration with the community.

name: Ide Yosuke no Mahjong Kyoushitsu
description: Ide Yōsuke no Mahjong Kyōshitsu is a Mahjong learning and practice game featuring Mahjong professional Ide Yōsuke. The game has a number of lessons shown with a manga style drawn Ide Yōsuke explaining the rules of the Chinese classic board game of Mahjong, and allows the player to try what they...

name: Gakkou wo Tsukurou!! Let's Make a School!!
description:
The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player as the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc.

The game features 3 different...

name: Gakkou wo Tsukurou!! Kouchou Sensei Monogatari
description:
The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player in the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc.

In this sequel the game features...

name: Nectaris: Military Madness
description:
An updated version of Military Madness (known in Japan as Nectaris) for PlayStation.

The game modes featured include Main Campaign, Original Campaign, Mini-Campaigns, and Single Scenario.

name: Yamasa Digi Guide: Hyper Rush
description: Yamasa Digi Guide - Hyper Rush is a gambling machine simulator. It faithfully emulate the Hyper Rush gambling machine with a good presentation, 3 different levels of zoom and the player can configurate all the options in the machine.

name: Yamasa Digi Guide: M-771
description: Yamasa Digi Guide - M-771 is a gambling machine simulator. It faithfully emulate the gambling machine with a good presentation and the player can configurate all the options in the machine.

name: Yamasa Digi Guide: New Pulsar R
description: Yamasa Digi Guide - New Pulsar R is a gambling machine simulator. It faithfully emulate the gambling machine with a good presentation and the player can configurate all the options in the machine.

name: Boku no Natsuyasumi Portable: Mushimushi Hakase to Teppenyama no Himitsu!!
description: An enhanced Playstation Portable port of the original Boku no Natsuyasumi. Essentially a "creator's cut" of the original, doubling the amount of insects able to be caught as well as adding three new characters to the story.

name: Family Chess
description: Family Chess is a chess simulation game published by Magnolia and released in Japan in 2002.

name: Yamasa Digi Selection
description: Yamasa Digi Selection is a collection of 3 gambling machines (Nights, Super Pikagoro R & Super Reno). It faithfully emulates three gambling machines with a good presentation and the player can configurate all the options in the machines.

name: Magical Date: Doki-doki Kokuhaku Daisakusen
description: Magical Date is a skill game and dating sim published by Taito in 1996 for arcade and PlayStation. In this game, the player picks one of three possible girls to date and then starts off in a square as in a board game, proceeding to other squares which have different mini games. At junction points...

name: Family Diamond
description: Family Diamond is a very basic digital version of Chinese checkers. The goal (just like in the board game) is to move your marbles across the board to the opposite site and, if possible, use you opponents' marbles to get further each turn. This game has no extras or special effects, it's just good...

name: Yamasa Digi Selection 2
description: Yamasa Digi Selection 2 is a collection of 4 gambling machines (Panic Saurus, Kung-Fu Retsuden, King Pulsar & Super Reno). It faithfully emulates four gambling machines with a good presentation and the player can configurate all the options in the machines

name: Yamasa Digi Guide: Faust
description: Yamasa Digi Guide - Faust is a gambling machine simulator. It faithfully emulate the Faust gambling machine with a good presentation, 3 different levels of zoom and the player can configurate all the options in the machine.

name: Gakkou wo Tsukurou!! 2
description:
The Gakkou o Tsukurou series places the player in the principal of a school, placing him in charge of management and renovating the school grounds. The player decides everything: The place and the new buildings, the professors, the new places of the school, etc.

In this sequel the game features...

name: Urawaza Mahjong: Korette Tenwatte Yatsukai
description: Urawaza Mahjong: Korette Tenwatte Yatsukai is a gambling\board game, developed and published by Spike, which was released in Japan in 2000.

name: Nihon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Honkaku Pro Mahjong: Shin Tetsuman
description: Nippon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Shin Tetsuman is a Mahjong board game, developed by Chat Noir and published by Naxat Soft, which was released in Japan in 1998.

name: Nihon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin: Tehodoki Mahjong Nyuumon-hen
description:
Nihon Pro Mahjong Renmei Kounin - Tehodoki Mahjong Nyuumon-hen is a educational game in which the player will learn the different rules of mahjong. The game will use video tutorial and quiz tests to teach the player evaluate his understanding.

Mahjong is a game for four players that originated in...

name: Tokimeki Memorial 2: EVS Append Disc
description: The Tokimeki Memorial 2 EVS Append Disc was published on three additional discs for Tokimeki Memorial 2 to allow the game's EVS (Emotional Voice System) to be available for the different girls. The EVS is a system that allows the girls to actually pronounce the protagonist's name. Only two of the...

name: Yakitori Musume: Sugo Ude Hanjouki
description: Like Media Entertainment's other cooking games, Manpuku!! Nabe Kazoku and Yakiniku Bugyou, Yakitori Musume is a fast-paced game of reflexes and memorization/timing. The difficulty curve seems a little higher than those other titles, however, and the unskippable slow conversations can get pretty...

name: The Pro Mahjong: Menkyo Minnaten
description:
The Pro Mahjong - Menkyo Kaiden is a mahjong game that features 5 different boards, 2 game modes:
- Tournament: Compete against different opponents advancing rounds.
- Free Mode: Play mahjong games against 15 Japanese spies of the Japan Pro Mahjong Federation opponents.

In the tournament...

name: Uchuu Goushouden: Bakuretsu Akindo
description: Bakuretsu Akindo Uchuu Goushouden is a sugoroku board game (Japanese backgammon) that takes its players to the universe. Gameplay offers a high degree of freedom. Player can choose to make money slowly by taking up ordinary jobs, or take a risk and make a fortune at one stroke.

name: Family Gunjin Shougi
description: Family Gunjin Shogi is a board game for player to enjoy “gunjin shogi” (Japanese chess with military theme) to the fullest. The key to outwit the highly intelligent computer-controlled opponent is to think a few steps forward when layout your pieces.

name: Ganso Family Mahjong
description: Ganso Family Mahjong is a mahjong game is which the player is a gambler (male or female one, since the game allows the player to choose a name, genre, blood type, etc) that in the new story mode he goes through some kind of board in which he advance playing mahjong matches againts computer...

name: Kisou Jidaigeki Sugoroku: Shinobi No Roku
description: Kisou Jidaigeki Sugoroku - Shinobi No Roku is a curious board game in which the player controls a group of ninja characters that will advance through different board tables using different kind of objects and battle cards. To advance the game displays a battle screen when they encounter an enemy.

name: Hi-Hou-Ou: Mou Omae to wa Kuchi Kikan!!
description: Hi-Hou-Oh is a board game in which the player (or player since the game feature up to 4 human players to play at the same time) takes the role of a treasure hunter that will take part on a treasure hunter's tournament in which they got to get as much money as they can at the end of each board...

name: Minna Atsumore! Igo Kyoushitsu
description: Minna Atsumore! Igo Kyoushitsu is a learning game that teachs players how to play go, the game features hundreds of different situations and depending of the player movement the game will say it the movement is the right one or not. The game features different background images.

name: Noël: La Niege Special
description:
Noël La Niege Special is the third game in the Noël series for the Playstation one console. This game is the sequel to Noël La Neige and features the same 3 female characters from that game: Yumi Tachibana, Ryo Midorikawa & Chisato Kadokura.

The game uses the same controls of Noël La Neige: each...

name: Cubixx
description: Use your laser to cut away the surfaces of a mysterious cube and free the energy within. Cutting longer lines and crossing multiple cube surfaces gives you bigger combos, but at far greater risk.

name: SuperLite 1500 Series: Cards II
description: "Cards II" includes 6 types of standard card games that can be played whenever you want: "Black Jack", "Poker", "Daifugo", "Pyramid", "Concentration" and "Speed". Have fun with these card games!

name: SuperLite 1500 Series Quiz Master Red
description: Challenge more than 16000 questions of quiz game in the main areas of "sports" and "science" in "QUIZ MASTER RED". You can choose from VS, Time Attack or Knock Out modes. In Knock Out mode, the quiz master awaits you with lots of difficult questions. Take the challenge!

name: Buggy Mess
description: Buggy Mess is a short game where your friend wants you to go buy the new game that just came out, you will need to get out of your cave and go buy the game at the store. This game was originally made for the RE:START 2022 PSP Game jam.

name: SuperLite 1500 Series Angolmois '99
description: "Angolmois99" is an addictive simple card game based on the prophecy of Nostradamus and includes real-life parody. Users become the earth's representative and compete against the Angolmois Four in card games that will decide the destiny of the planet. Luck, insight, intuition and split-second...

name: SuperLite 1500 Series Quiz Master Blue
description: Challenge more than 16000 questions of quiz game in the main areas of "Literature/Liberal Arts" and "Socio-tech". You can choose from VS, Time Attack or Knock Out modes. In Knock Out mode, the quiz master awaits you with lots of difficult questions. Take the challenge!

name: SuperLite 1500 Series Quiz Master Yellow
description: Challenge more than 16000 questions of quiz game in the main areas of "life" and "culture" in "QUIZ MASTER YELLOW". You can choose from VS, Time Attack or Knock Out modes. In Knock Out mode, the quiz master awaits you with lots of difficult questions. Take the challenge!

name: SuperLite 1500 Series Hanafuda II
description: Hanafuda II is a table top card game, developed and published by Success, which was released in Japan in 1999.

name: Memories Off
description:
Unlike the original Memories Off game for the PlayStation, PSP release features several new additions to the otherwise existing story and gameplay.

CG is now displayed in wide screen PSP resolution showing more of the background image. The additional After Story novel extends the original Memories...

name: Mahjong Uranai Fortuna: Tsuki no Megami-tachi
description: If you have been seeking a way to play the ancient game of mahjong and possibly get your fortune read by an adorable girl, then Mahjong Uranai Fortuna ~Tsuki no Megami Tachi~ is just the groundbreaking game you are looking for.

name: Salary Man Champ Tatakau Salary man
description:
The game consists of a variety of different, mostly odd, minigames. this fun title involves challenges such as curry eating contests, running up stairwells and out running kiss blowing blokes!

The game is a conversion of the Arcade Machine by Konami.
